medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began acutely yesterday and gradually migrated to the right lower quadrant. The patient denies fevers or chills and is moving her bowels regularly. There was an episode of non-bilious emesis in the emergency department.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Paroxysmal SVT, migraines, asthma, Raynaud's; past surgical history includes cardiac ablation.
